name: J C
text: All you can eat pizza and salad at a good price.

name: Christina Sali
text: My children and I visited this location Sept 30 at noon, a Sunday. When we first arrived the selection of pizza was dry, old, and very disgusting so I nibbled a few bites and waited for better selection. It took them about 15 minutes (I …More

name: robert beavers
text: The pizza was good. There was a decent selection of pizza during the lunch hour. Their pasta was also delicious. This is a good quick eat if you like pizza.

name: BamaSam777
text: I love coming here. They will bring out any pizza you want. And the cinnamon rolls are worth a visit themselves. Good people and good service.

name: Dianna Valdez
text: This place has really seen better economic times. Quality of food is a far cry from where it started at 10+ years ago. …More

name: Rick Nickel
text:
Even though it's a buffet, if you ask for a pizza that's a favorite of yours, they will quickly make one for you and place it in the buffet.
That's great service! …More

name: Stephen Archibald
text: This was our first visit since a recent change of ownership, management, and staff.  The biggest adjustment was the removal of trays.  This made it harder than in the past to carry a plate of food, plasticware, a cup, and napkins to the …More

name: Natalie Corson
text: Honestly I don't feel they have enough customer base for a buffett(freshness). I love cicis and they have an amazing crew trying their hardest here but with the parkway designed the way it is now it's just not going to work in this location :(

name: Amber Allen
text: Pizza is really good when it's fresh. You can order special pizzas so that helps. There's always a coupon somewhere for a discount. And kids under three eat free. This is a great place for groups who can't agree on one pizza or picky kids.

name: Asia Cartwright
text: It's good for what it is for. A place to entertain and feed picky children who only like pasta and pizza. If judged on that alone it would receive 5 stars but considering I am an adult it fails to impress. The food is edible but it stops there. The desert was lacking at best. But my children love it. For that thank you CiCi's.

name: Brian Dunbar
text: Great store. Buffet was fully stocked and the staff were very nice.

name: Keshawn williams
text: Love It....The Workers Was Amazing Great Service My Kids Love It

name: Brooke Hopkins
text: We came around 8:50 ish because their website said they closed at 11. We paid $30 (there were 4 people) well apparently they don’t close at 11 y’all lol. They started throwing away the pizza around 9 and not much of a selection plus we only had 10 min to eat. I get closing times but they didn’t even say anything to us. Just disappointed.

name: Roby Dorsett
text: Pizza is always yummy for the price.  Clean and friendly staff.  Willing to put what you want out if you ask.  Kids love it.

name: Rick Duffy
text: Great food and drinks.Excellent service

name: Sam Dudley
text: Very rude employees. They ran out of RANCH!!! A pizza place runs out of ranch, how is that possible? Not a clean place and the food is disappointing!!

name: Jill Worrell
text: The pizza choices have changed and everytime I've gone they have like no pizza left out and its not that busy. I've had an alfredo cheese pizza not cooked all the way..cheese legit slid off as u tried to eat it and it was still doey... The noodles were awesome though.

name: Jack Benimble
text:
Terrible attitude from management because I questioned their brownies status. The we’re raw in the center and gross!
Very dirty tables and I will never comeback! As a matter of fact I’m boycotting ALL CiCi facilities. It’s my right!

name: Lisa Wright
text: This was the worst place I have ever are. The pizza was either so greasy or so thin u couldn't eat it. So I ordered a pizza bowl with extra ham and mushrooms. There was really only like 5 pieces of ham and maybe 4 mushrooms in the whole thing. I will never be going back to this place.

name: Bridgette Campbell
text: TODAY IS PRESIDENT'S DAY. KIDZ ARE OUT IF SCHOOL SO THERE IS NO BETTER PLACE TO EAT CHEAP WITH GREAT FOOD. I LOVE THE SALAD BAR. YOU HAVE MANY OPTIONS TO MAKE YOUR SALAD THE WAY YOU LIKE IT. NOW YOU CAN ORDER A PERSONAL PIZZA FOR U IF IT'S …More

name: William S Perkins Jr
text: The Cicis at 10004 Memorial Pkwy is awful. The redhead manager has a really bad attitude and talk to people very rudely. This place is very a nasty. Hair was all over my son brownie and cinnamon rolls. I'm will never bring my family here again.

name: David Rawlins
text: Pizza was cold, not even warm, dry, and not very flavorful. The salad bar, don't even ask. In all, this place sucked!!!!

name: Sonjay Patel
text: A good place for people that don't have a discerning pallet.

name: Coming in Hot Kenny
text: The best cc’s on the planet

name: Jason Kennedy
text: Retired military is just as good as active duty personnel who gone the whole twenty years plus, most don't commit to such a long haul, I may have to look for an establishment THAT honors retired personnel

name: JOHN MANN
text: UPDATE 8-9-17: I decided to give CiCi's one more try. Sorry I did. They no longer have a special price Senior Buffet (they give you a beverage for only 40¢ more than the regular adult buffet). They no longer have trays to carry your food to …More

name: Geneva Wood Boggess
text: I don't care for the brownies anymore. They are too soft in the middle. Gooey.

name: thick bennett
text: The food was horrible and cold. This is the absolute worst Cici's I have ever had! The young man at the register was very polite and that really the only positive thing I can say about my visit. I will not ever be back to this location

name: Jessica Clayton
text: I currently work here and the place is super friendly with wonderful food.

name: Erica Tager
text: The food was so dry, you could tell it had been there sitting under the lights for a long time. It wasn't until a huge group of people came in that they started making fresh. Even though there was already several people in the store. The …More

name: Your Local BC fanboy
text: I love there b&Q chicken pizza

name: Carrie Shelley
text: The pizza is usually good, we come here quite often, the service was great and they kept the pizzas hot, but this time the pizzas they were cooking wasn't very good, actually the salad bar was better this time then the choice of pizzas, I'm …More

name: Primarily Ponds
text: Its good for the price but lately not enough pizzas ready or deserts

name: Tysha West
text: Always love their food, for the price

name: Lori Stolz
text: The employees are not friendly at all... My daughter and I went to eat around 9:40 pm on a Saturday night...  After looking up the hours of operation...  When we arrived the door was locked the lady behind the counter stood there looking at …More

name: Caleb Hawn
text: Cicis pizza is a wonderful pizzeria to go to! They have amazing pizza, and amazingly nice people. My favorite thing about this place is that they use their signature pasta noodles for pretty much everything. You can get the pasta plain or …More

name: Tes raB
text: Modest price to product. The product is ok, as is the price, the value is in the volume. I don't really enjoy this place unless I'm in the mood to eat multiple pizzas...

name: Robin
text: Clean, friendly good buffet

name: Minnie Dewey
text: The restaurant did not have plain cheese pizza on a Monday night. That's all my child will eat. What kind of pizza buffet doesn't have plain cheese at all times?! This one apparently.

name: Eric Motley
text: Great place to eat.

name: Chris Victor
text:
Way better than the one on University Drive.

This one is in a better part of town, which is why it's alot nicer.

name: Irrelevant info
text: The best cicis I've been too

name: Bill Juber
text: Great selection and always willing to make special orders

name: Sandra Stephens
text: I love pizza, and the price for seniors is very affordable.

name: Kisa Kitsugi
text: Decent Pizza cheap need I say more?

name: Kingdom First
text: Good cheap and clean

name: Akita Shadow
text: Decent food alright prices

name: Robina Hendrix
text: Great pizza buffet, has everything you want!

name: Steve Russell
text: Last time we went the place was approximately to 1/3 filed sloth customers.  We stayed for almost 90 minutes because  we were constantly waiting on pizza. They had all together 4 pizzas out at the most. The pizzas weren't cut all the way through and some were chewy. I don't expect much from Cici's but that was an all time low!

name: Thomas Tipton
text: Great pizza for kids and families on a budget

name: Kevin Hauck
text: Decent food for a decent price

name: William Scott

name: Jessica Hill
text: Why does it say there open till 11pm on website but when you get there at 8 there locking the doors

name: Arthur Sharp

name: Jerry Lamb
text: I hate that you have to clean up your own stuff now, they don't put out the good pizza anymore, all the pepper and cheese shakers are gone from the tables. It sucks!
